New Records: Suryakumar Yadav scored 51 off 25 balls, the highest score in the match; India's total of 179/2 in 20 overs; Netherlands' total of 123/9 in 20 overs
Key Match Events: India successfully chased down the target of 123 runs; Virat Kohli and Suryakumar Yadav led the chase with Kohli scoring 62 and Yadav 51; Netherlands struggled with their batting performance; several key wickets fell at crucial moments
Pre-Game Insights: India elected to bat first after winning the toss; Netherlands had a tough time in their previous matches but had a strong bowling attack; both teams had their key players in the lineup
Post-Match Reflections: Suryakumar Yadav was named Player of the Match for his outstanding performance; India's victory was a significant achievement in the tournament
Miscellaneous Highlights: The match was played under few clouds, affecting visibility; the pitch was batting-friendly with an average first-inning score of 182
Others: The match was the 23rd in the T20 World Cup 2022, held at the Sydney Cricket Ground
